name: SAAS
description: Software that is available online and accessed by users as needed. An alternative to software that is downloaded

name: SEO
description: The process of optimising a website to be found by search engines

name: SSO
description: The ability to sign on to a website in one location and access all of its services

name: CSS
description: A language used to organise and design how a web site looks

name: API
description: An external interface from an application that other applications can access

name: DOM
description: A cross-platform and language-independent convention for interacting with documents

name: JS
description: A client-side scripting language used to develop Web applications
